channel.description: Block Scope # Global block x = int(input("Enter a number: ")) if x > 5: # block A y = int(input("Enter a number: ")) if y > 10: # block B z = 10 else: # block C z = 5 elif x < 0: # block D a = -5 else: # block E b = 0 print("?") Main Block # Global block x = int(input("Enter a number: "
